item.title: Writing Guide
item.author: sky_io@outlook.com (K4i)
item.description: Create new post First you need to create a file for you to write. Here’s how you can create a new post: 1 2 3 4 hugo new posts/writing-guide.md # will create content/en/posts/writing-guide.md, 'en' is set as my site's default language hugo new posts/writing-guide.zh.md # content/zh/posts/writing-guide.zh.md hugo new posts/writing-guide/index.md # content/en/posts/writing-guide/index.md hugo new posts/writing-guide/index.zh.md # content/en/posts/writing-guide/index.zh.md I prefer to create a directory for each of my writings, so I can add extra stuff like images for that specific page more easily.
